rows.label: tev014201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_SEL0011
rows.name:
Ask Nathan about the base camps
located throughout Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Nathan about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_SEL0031
rows.name:
Ask Nathan about the base camps
located throughout Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Nathan about the base camps in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Nathan about the base camps in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0001
rows.name:
As you explore Mira, you'll come across base camps
that have been set up by the various divisions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Any BLADE can use these camps, even if they're from
a different division.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0003
rows.name:
If you're tired, you can use a tent or trailer there and
rest up for as long as you like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0004
rows.name:
If it's your first time visiting an area, it's always a
good idea to stop at a base camp and see what you
can learn about the place from the BLADEs there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0005
rows.name:
Making good use of base camps can mitigate the risks
of exploring uncharted terrain. And that makes it a little
more likely that you'll find your way home to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0008
rows.name:
That Conner... When he got back to New LA,
he bought himself a nice sturdy belt chain so he
wouldn't drop his comm device again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0009
rows.name:
Isn't he precious? ...Still, he really seems determined
not to screw up like that again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0010
rows.name:
Even Monica's putting the team first these days.
She actually went and apologized to Conner for
bad-mouthing him when he was just thinking of others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0011
rows.name:
I was worried that the team might break apart over
what happened, so I'm relieved that everyone managed
to reconcile.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0012
rows.name:
Thanks a lot for your help. None of this would have
happened without you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0021
rows.name:
Maintaining base camps in areas populated by
violent indigens is a dangerous job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0022
rows.name:
So the BLADEs stationed there are real tough customers.
They have to be in order to survive the perpetual battle
to protect their camps.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0023
rows.name:
Anyway, if you have an open spot on your team you'd
like filled, you should ask around at a base camp.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0024
rows.name:
I'm sure you can find a good, trustworthy BLADE who's
willing to help you explore the area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0029
rows.name:
Needle Rock base camp is located in the area just past
Seabird's Beak.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0030
rows.name:
Some BLADEs stationed there found a strange cave
behind the giant spherical plant east of the camp.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0031
rows.name:
But the cave was halfway up the inner side of the wall-
like cliffs that surround the continent, so even when they
approached from the sea, they weren't able to reach it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0032
rows.name:
It's an unexplored territory, you know. I bet there's
some sort of precious treasure inside. Hard-to-reach
places always contain treasure, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0033
rows.name:
Anyway, if you can get your hands on one of those
flying Skells they're developing, you should probably
go check it out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014201_MSG0043
rows.name:
Now that they're available for fieldwork, maybe you
should get a Skell flight module and check it out?[ST:wait ]
